name: Project Planner
description:
It is a project management tool that allows you to track your current projects.
It allows you to browse, search, sort, create, edit current projects. As well as view the details, add and delete notes.
Built with RoR API, React, Semantic-UI, CSS.

name: Weather Converter
description:
This is a website that shows Portland Maine and its real-time weather.
You can browse the photos and convert the degrees from Farenheit to Celcius.
Built with HTML, CSS,Javascript, jQuery, OpenWeather API.
